validate_onchain_alpha.conclusion: On-chain features do NOT add value at hourly frequency (AUC delta -0.008)
evidence: Finding #1 (+0.15 Sharpe, XGBoost 30d) INVALIDATED by holdout failure (Sharpe -1.48)
Macro features contribute 2-3% importance but add noise
validate_onchain_alpha.recommendation: ABANDON on-chain/macro features for hourly models. Stick with 23 base technical features.

paper_trading_confirmation.blocker: Current model unprofitable (Sharpe 0.646 vs Buy&Hold 0.950, -56% return deficit). Need profitable backtest first.

invalidated_experiments.name: Daily momentum > 0.05 rule
invalidated_experiments.reason: Data snooping - tested 31 configurations on same holdout

invalidated_experiments.name: Daily momentum > 0.05 rule (look-ahead bias)
invalidated_experiments.reason: Look-ahead bias - signals at T used returns ending at T instead of starting at T
invalidated_experiments.note: Bug found by human (AK), confirmed in 43_BUG_REPORT_LOOKAHEAD_BIAS.md
